scripts.test: asar p ./spec/_app --unpack=*.node ./spec/app.asar && asar p ./spec/_app-default-entry ./spec/app-default-entry.asar && asar p ./spec/_app-default-entry-json ./spec/app-default-entry-json.asar && asar p ./spec/_app-default-entry-node --unpack=*.node ./spec/app-default-entry-node.asar && asar p ./spec/_app-pkg-default-entry ./spec/app-pkg-default-entry.asar && asar p ./spec/_app-pkg-default-entry-json ./spec/app-pkg-default-entry-json.asar && asar p ./spec/_app-pkg-default-entry-node --unpack=*.node ./spec/app-pkg-default-entry-node.asar && asar p ./spec/_app-default-entry-error ./spec/app-default-entry-error.asar && asar p ./spec/_app-pkg-entry ./spec/app-pkg-entry.asar && asar p ./spec/_app-pkg-entry-error ./spec/app-pkg-entry-error.asar && node ./spec/subdir/index.js
